title: The Terrorizers
description: Name: Matthew HelmCode Name: EricMission: The TerrorizersRemarks: When they fished him out of the bay & he woke up in a Canadian hopital, he had no idea who he was. The plane crash had wiped his mind clean of the past. Then this gorgeous chick waltzed int his room & told him he was Paul Madden, a photographer, her fiance, which seemed like a pretty good deal. Except when some joker called on the phone & told him he was Matt Helm. Somehow he knew this meant trouble. Bad trouble.
author: Donald Hamilton
